stripped_text: Rez only during your action phase. Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on this server, they gain 2 credits. When your turn begins, gain 3 credits if the Runner did not make any successful runs on this server during their last turn.
text:
Rez only during your action phase.
Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on this server, they gain 2[credit].
When your turn begins, gain 3[credit] if the Runner did not make any successful runs on this server during their last turn.
title: Daily Quest
